subtitle: Software Engineer
bio: I am an experienced software developer with a strong background in both frontend and backend development using various frameworks. In my current role as the Director and CTO at iXDLabs, I oversee the technical aspects of the company and supervise a team of software engineers. I am passionate about algorithms, problem-solving, and web technologies, and I am always looking to learn and grow as a developer.
name: Sunera Avinash
